titles.title: The Wilderness Is Glad For Us

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The wilderness is glad for us
Hear the desert rejoice
For the sounds of joy and singing we bring
For we can see the glory
The glory of the Lord
In the wilderness waters are breaking out

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Strengthen the weak hands
Confirm the feeble knees
Say to them that are of a fearful heart “Be strong”
For streams are flowing in the desert
Streams are flowing in the desert
And in the wilderness waters are breaking out!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Now the eyes of the blind are opened
And the ears of the deaf unstopped
Now the lame men leap
And the tongue of the dumb can sing
And in a land so parched and thirsty
Springs of water now abound
For in the wilderness waters are breaking out.
